subject: Podcast Pitch Template
content:
Hello {insert contact name}, 

 

Congratulations on building an amazing podcast. I love the value your show provides. I enjoy {insert something specific from the podcast: great guest, interesting thought, etc.}

 

My name is {insert your name}, and I’m a {insert what you do}. 

 

{Insert one paragraph that lists your social proof. That can be any awards you’ve won, your education, training you’ve taken, specific clients you’ve helped, companies you’ve helped, or any media you’re gotten}


Topics I Could Cover on Your Show 

 

{Insert the topics you could cover on podcasts}

 

Example:

 

Some topics I could cover include:

  • Topic one

  • Topic two

  • Etc.

My appearance on your podcast would offer nothing but practical value. I’m not self-promotional and would offer your audience only things they can use to improve their lives. 

 

Would you like a call to discuss?

 

{End with a thank you and your name}

 

Thank you for your time,

 

{Name and link to a media page (if you have one)}

subject: Contributor Pitch
content:
Hello {insert contact name},

 

I follow the content you share on social media and love the practical value each article provides. 

 

I’m submitting a few possible article submissions for {insert the publication’s name}. 

 

My name is {insert your name, and what you do}.

 

Some samples of my writing:

{List the title of the article and hyperlink to the publication—list between one and five samples}

 

Examples:

  • Example one.

  • Example two.

  • Example three. 

If you don’t have any writing samples, pitch with no writing samples—that is fine. 

 

Article ideas:

{List one to three potential articles you could write for the publication—this is a headline and one to three paragraphs describing what the article would be about}

———

{End with your name and a thank you. No signature line attachments}

Thank you for your time, 

{Insert your name}

subject: Speaking Pitch
content:
Hello {insert contact name}, 

 

Congratulations on building a thriving conference that's transforming lives and helping so many of your attendees. 

 

My name is {insert your name}, and I’m a {insert what you do}.

{Insert one paragraph that lists your social proof. That can be any awards you’ve won, your education, training you’ve taken, specific clients you’ve helped, companies you’ve helped, or any media you’re gotten}


Topics I Could Speak About

{Insert the topics you could and normally speak on—up to four signature talks}

 

When You Book Me, You Get More Than a Session Speaker

  • I have a highly engaged audience. When you book me, I will promote your event to my audience to try and increase sales for your event. 

  • I will promote the event before and after to my email list, Facebook group, media outlets, and my high-end clients.

  • I will deliver a practical talk that’s tailored to your audience. The talk will fit the allotted time frame and wow your audience. 

  • I offer a post-talk session to make sure your needs were met. 

 

Can we have a conversation? 

 

Thanks,

{Insert your name and business (if you have one)}

subject: PR/Large Publication Feature Pitch
content:
Hello {insert contact name}, 

 

I enjoy reading your articles on {insert the topic area they cover}. It’s interesting to read {insert something specific from their column}.

 

My name is {insert your name}, and I’m a {insert what you do}.

{Insert one paragraph that lists your social proof. That can be any awards you’ve won, your education, training you’ve taken, specific clients you’ve helped, companies you’ve helped, or any media you’re gotten}


Topics I Could Cover as a Source

 

I’m a subject matter expert in {Insert the topics you could cover as an expert}. I could be available for interviews and/or quotes on short notice. Here are some things I could cover:

{Insert the topics you could cover}

  • Topic one.

  • Topic two.

  • Topic three. 

I’m not self-promotional, and I would offer insights that complement and support the articles you’re writing. 

{End with a thank you and your name}

 

Thank you for your time,

{Link to a media page if you have one}

subject: Follow Up Template
content:
Hello {insert contact name}, 

 

I know you’re busy, so I hope this doesn’t come off as intrusive. I wanted to follow up on my pitch and see if you’d like a call or email exchange to discuss how I can add value. 

{End with a thank you and your name}

 

Thank you for your time,

{Name and link to a media page (if you have one)}
